name: Down the rabbit hole (itch) (Vitalii Zavoloka)
description:
In 2021 the world has changed forever. Billions of people started to believe in conspiracy theories and they became real. All of them! To free humanity from this madness, a lone hero, the last sane scientist of Earth goes deep inside the metaphysical world to eliminate the whole idea of conspiracy theories. And he's armed with the most powerful weapon - true knowledge!

You need to reach the great goal (White stone with purple light).

There are many conspiracy enemies around you, so use your books to beat them. 

But be careful and use only the correct book as a counter-argument in a particular moment. Otherwise, they evolve...-

--------------------

Controls (M&K):

WASD to move

Left Mouse Button to use The Power of Science 

Right Mouse Button to use The Annals of History 

Gamepad (in progress)

Left Stick to Move 

Left Trigger to use The Power of Science 

Right Trigger to use The Annals of History

Devs

3D/Art: Mykhailo Novoseltsev

Code: Vitalii Zavoka, Yevhen Lozko 

Sound / Main Menu UI: Vlad Melnyk

Thanks to  Taras Kovtun for additional help during  the last hours ; )
